description: Organic Fields Limited, established in 2018, is a Kenyan initiative focused on transforming food waste into organic fertilizer. The project addresses market cleanliness issues by collecting and composting waste from local markets. With a commitment to sustainability, they produce high-quality organic fertilizer, employing over 70 staff and collaborating with cooperatives and agricultural institutions. Their innovative approach not only enhances soil health but also promotes community engagement and environmental responsibility.
name: Organic Fields Limited
